'''Chef de Cuisine''' is [[Xiangling]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*"ATK-boosting dishes" also includes dishes that boost [[Critical Rate|CRIT Rate]] and [[Damage Bonus/Physical|Physical DMG Bonus]].

==Trivia==
*{{w|Chef de cuisine}} is a French term meaning "chief of the kitchen," referring to the head chef of a restaurant.
